summary: A bullied teenager is sent to a reform school where he accidentally summons the spirit of a girl, herself a victim of bullying, who takes vengeance on his tormentors.
cast: Andrew Bryniarski|Justin Prentice|Ronen Rubinstein|Matt Beene|Josh Ethier|Michael Polish|Gracie Gillam|Maestro Harrell|Lexi Atkins|Brando Eaton|Jeremy Hawkins|Jasper Polish|Spencer Breslin|Sierra McCormick|Dave Reeves|Imani Hakim|Jisaura Cardinale|Audrey Ellis Fox|Dylan Golshan|Drew Klopfer|Anthony Omari|Jonathan Salomon|Noah Segan|Gabi Stewart|Rachael Edlow|Eryn Rea|Brian Patrick Reynolds|Brittany Riley
title: Some kind of hate
